SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.players.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerModel
public class Player extends Object implements PlayerModel
Class to handle players in a game. A player has a unique id for identification and a username.
Each player will manage a playing area and their hand of playable cards

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Player.Deserializer
    Custom deserializer for Player, used for reloading player data from a game save file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String username)
      Creates a new player, initializing their ID and username to a chosen value, and their other attributes to standard values.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's in-game name

    • Player

      private Player(String username, int currGamePoints, int currObjectivePoints, ObjectiveCard personalObjective, List<ObjectiveCard> possiblePersonalObjectives, StarterCard starterCard, PlayerColor color, Hand hand, PlayArea playArea, boolean choseStarterCardSide, boolean choseObjectiveCard, boolean choseColor, Chat chat)
      Constructs a new Player with the given attributes. Used when reloading players from a game save file. This constructor is private because it should only be used by Player.Deserializer
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      currGamePoints - The player's current game points, which are points that are scored throughout the game.
      currObjectivePoints - The player's objective points, tallied up at the end of the game.
      personalObjective - The player's personal objective.
      possiblePersonalObjectives - The choices given to the player for the personal objective.
      starterCard - The player's starter card.
      color - The player's color.
      hand - The player's hand, containing the cards currently playable by the player.
      playArea - The player's play area, containing information on the cards placed by the player, and the resources and objects currently visible.
      choseStarterCardSide - Whether the player has already chosen their starter card's side.
      choseObjectiveCard - Whether the player has already chosen their objective.
      choseColor - Whether the player has already chosen their color.

    • giveCard

      public void giveCard(PlayableCard card)
      Adds a card to the player's hand. This should be triggered at the end of each of the player's turns to replace the card just placed beforehand.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(PlayableCard card)
      Removes a card from the player's hand, if present.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to remove from the player's hand

    • playCard

      public void playCard(PlayableCard card, SideType side, Position newCardPos) throws IllegalMoveException
      Places a card from the player's hand on the board.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be placed
      side - The side the card will be placed on
      newCardPos - The position of the card on the player's board
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if the player made an illegal move

    • giveObjectiveOptions

      public void giveObjectiveOptions(ObjectiveCard firstOption, ObjectiveCard secondOption)
      Gives the player the two objective cards to choose from, adding them to the options attribute.
      Parameters:
      firstOption - The first card
      secondOption - The second card

    • giveStarterCard

      public void giveStarterCard(StarterCard starterCard)
      Gives the player their starter card.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - The given starter card

    • setObjectiveCard

      public void setObjectiveCard(ObjectiveCard objectiveCard) throws UnknownObjectiveCardException
      Sets the player's objective card of choice between the two possible ones, signaling that the choice has been made.
      Parameters:
      objectiveCard - The chosen objective card
      Throws:
      UnknownObjectiveCardException

    • chooseStarterCardSide

      public void chooseStarterCardSide(SideType side) throws NoStarterCardException
      Sets the active side for the player's starter card, signaling that the choice has been made (links the Game and PlayArea objects).
      Parameters:
      side - The chosen side
      Throws:
      NoStarterCardException - If the player has no starter card to place (either not given yet, or already placed).

    • evaluateCommonObjectives

      public void evaluateCommonObjectives(ObjectiveCard commonObjective)
      Evaluates the total amount of points gathered by completing a common objective card (links the Game and PlayArea objects), thus increasing the player's current objective points.
      Parameters:
      commonObjective - The objective card to evaluate

    • evaluatePersonalObjective

      public void evaluatePersonalObjective()
      Evaluates the total amount of points gathered by completing the player's personal objective (links the Game and PlayArea objects), thus increasing the player's current objective points.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(PlayerColor color)
      Sets the player's in-game color.
      Parameters:
      color - The chosen color
